Wisdom: رُسُلُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ تَرَاجِمَةُ الْحَقِّ وَالسُّفَرَاءُ بَيْنَ الْخَالِقِ وَالْخَلْقِ
enWisdom: Messengers of Allah, the Glorified, are interpreters of the truth and intermediaries between the Creator and the creation

Wisdom: لِرُسُلِ اللَّهِ فِي كُلِّ حُكْمٍ تَبْيِينٌ
enWisdom: The Messengers of Allah have a clear elucidation for every [divine] command

Wisdom: لَمْ يُخْلِ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عِبَادَهُ مِنْ حُجَّةٍ لَازِمَةٍ أَوْ مَحَجَّةٍ قَائِمَةٍ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, never leaves His servants without a necessary proof or an established, clear path

Wisdom: لَمْ يُخْلِ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عِبَادَهُ مِنْ نَبِيٍّ مُرْسَلٍ أَوْ كِتَابٍ مُنْزَلٍ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, never lets His servants remain without a divinely appointed Prophet or a revealed book [to guide them]

Wisdom: مَا اخْتَلَفَتْ دَعْوَتَانِ إِلَّا كَانَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا ضَلَالَةً
enWisdom: Two calls never differ but that one of them leads to misguidance
There is nothing after clarification but confusion
